imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Beyblade X logo with red and black color scheme, bold geometric design suitable for website header (beyblade-x-logo.dim_200x80.png)

existing_features.title: Replace the text-based logo in the AppHeader component with the custom Beyblade X image that was previously pasted by the user

new_feature_requests.summary: Use custom image as website logo in header
